name: backrooms 2d alpha 0.1
description:
alpha 1 of a backrooms style 2d game 

contains:

  1. player animation and movment
  2. 1 enemy
  3.  escape door (leads to next room
  4. dynamic light 
  5. large room count
  6.  Game loop
  7. death screen
  8. menu
  9. (Not Complete) level 1
  10. pause menu- brocken a bit

please type comments on what needs to be improved 

(WARNING NOT FULL GAME)

find the door to get to level 1 and make sure to be careful
